title: It's Your Door
description:
How are you defending what God gave you? In “It’s Your Door,” Pastor Steven teaches us the importance of putting practices in place that will guard our hearts when the enemy attacks.

If you’ve just made a decision for Christ, please respond HERE: http://ele.vc/tIepfr
dc:creator: Elevation Church
